statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE eco_friendly_products = TRUE
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE eco_friendly_products = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_suppliers FROM suppliers;
SELECT id, name, location FROM supplier;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE is_eco_friendly = TRUE ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM supplier WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE is_eco_friendly = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier.name, product.name FROM supplier JOIN product ON supplier.id = product.supplier_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, source_name FROM products JOIN product_sources ON products.product_id = product_sources.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating >= 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name, products.price FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, source_name FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id INNER JOIN product_sources ON products.product_id = product_sources.product_id WHERE product_sources.sustainability_certification = 'organic';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE is_ecofriendly = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM product_reviews WHERE review_rating > 3;

SELECT s1.supplier_name, s2.supplier_name, sr.relationship_type FROM supplier_relationships AS sr JOIN suppliers AS s1 ON sr.supplier_id = s1.supplier_id JOIN suppliers AS s2 ON sr.related_supplier_id = s2.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE is_ecofriendly = true;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'California' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, is_sustainable FROM products WHERE is_sustainable = true ORDER BY product_category ASC, product_name DESC;

SELECT pr.reviewer_name, pr.review_text, p.product_name FROM product_reviews pr JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pr.review_rating >= 4 ORDER BY pr.review_rating DESC, p.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM products JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, date_sourced FROM suppliers JOIN sourcing_history ON suppliers.supplier_id = sourcing_history.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE 'John%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE s.contact_person = 'Alice';
SELECT product_name, eco_friendly, sustainable FROM products p JOIN sustainability_info si ON p.product_id = si.product_id WHERE si.eco_friendly = TRUE AND si.sustainable = TRUE;
